directions: Whisk together the sugar, sesame seeds, sesame oil, poppy seeds, dried onion, paprika, oil and vinegar. Refrigerate until chilled.
In a salad bowl, combine the spinach and strawberries. Drizzle with dressing, toss lightly and serve.
ingredients: 2 bunches fresh spinach - chopped, washed and dried
title: Strawberry Spinach Salad II
